info.description: Our HTTP [REST API](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Representational_state_transfer) allows you to manage vital details of your account and services in client portal. [JSON](http://www.json.org/) is used for all API returns.
info.title: DNS.services User API

post.description: Generate new authorization token using refresh token

Invalidate authorization and refresh token.
Pass refresh token or call this method with valid access token

get.description: Return registration details for my account
Returns logs from history
Return a list of contacts on this account

List possible contact privileges.
Each domain and service may list additional privileges, depending on available features.

200.description:
```json
{
 "privileges": {
 "billing": [
 "emails", // Receive billing notifications
 "payinvoice", // Allow to view/pay invoices
 "orders", // Allow to place new orders
 "balance", // View account balance
 "addfunds", // Add account funds
 "creditcard" // Edit Credit Card details
 ],
 "support": [
 "newticket", // Open new tickets
 "tickets", // View all tickets
 "closeticket", // Close tickets
 "emails" // Receive email notifications from support
 ],
 "misc": [
 "editmain", // Modify main profile details
 "emails", // View emails history
 "editipaccess", // Edit allowed IP access
 "manageprofiles", // Add / Edit contacts
 "affiliates" // Access affiliates section
 ],
 "services": {
 "full": 1, // Full control over services
 "332": [
 "basic", // View basic details
 "billing", // View billing info
 "cancelation", // Request cancellation
 "upgrade", // Upgrade / Downgrade
 "notify", // Receive related email notifications 
 (...)
 "logindetails"
 ]
 },
 "domains": {
 "full": 1, // Full control over domains
 "523": [
 "basic", // View basic details
 "renew", // Renew domain
 "notify", // Receive related email notifications 
 "contactinfo", // Contact Information
 (...)
 "nameservers" // Manage Nameservers
 ]
 }
 }
}

parameters.description: Add with value 1 if ticket message contain sensitive data

get.description: Get ticket details, including all replies

200.description:
```json
{
 "ticket": {
 "date": "2016-12-30 12:48:13",
 "ticket_number": "736633",
 "name": "Joe Doe",
 "email": "api@example.com",
 "subject": "Lore Ipsum",
 "body": "Donec sollicitudin molestie malesuada. \r\nSed porttitor lectus nibh. Vivamus magna justo, \r\nlacinia eget consectetur sed, convallis at tellus.",
 "status": "Answered",
 "client_read": "1",
 "deptname": "Billing"
 },
 "replies": [
 {
 "id": "929",
 "name": "Suppport Staff",
 "date": "2016-12-30 12:51:04",
 "body": "Vestibulum ac diam sit amet quam \r\nvehicula elementum sed sit amet dui. \r\nPraesent sapien massa\r\n\r\n-- Maecenas efficitur elit est --",
 "status": "Sent",
 "type": "Admin"
 }
 ]
}

parameters.name: encrypt
parameters.description: Add with value 1 if reply message contain sensitive data

parameters.description: Set to true when you want to send your upgrade request

parameters.description: set to false to terminate service at the end of billing date, true - terminate immediately

post.description:
Create and submit new order for selected product.

To get available cycle and configuration options lookup product details
using `GET /order/@product_id`

parameters.name: domain
parameters.description: Domain name, ie. example.com, may be optional

parameters.name: custom
parameters.description: Additional options data available for sop products

post.description:
Create and submit new order for multiple services

Each item in the `items` array needs to include order `type` and parameters used
by one of the method listed below:
 • `POST /order/$product_id` - use `product` for item type • `POST /domain/order` - use `domain` for item type

parameters.name: ignore_errors
parameters.description: Process order even if some of the items were rejected due to errors

post.description:
Calculate order cost and recurring prices for selected items.
Use the same parameters as for `POST /order`

parameters.name: output
parameters.description: Type of output, default is short. Possible options short - Basic details about the item in cart config- Basic details and form components full - All details available in cart

get.description: Returns a list of all DNS
Returns a list of DNS zones under the service
Returns details of the DNS zone

post.description: Creates a new record in the DNS zone

put.description: Edits the selected DNS zone record

delete.description: Removes the selected DNS zone record

amount.description: Optional credit amount, when no value is specified maximum amount to fully pay the invoice will be used

encrypt.description: Add with value 1 if reply message contain sensitive data

nameservers.description: Optional array with 2 - 4 nameservers that you want to use

content.description: Record content eg. IP address for A records

epp.description: EPP Transfer code, required when transfering some domains

registrant.description: Optional contact ID to use for registrant contact this domain

admin.description: Optional contact ID to use for admin contact this domain

tech.description: Optional contact ID to use for tech contact this domain

billing.description: Optional contact ID to use for billing contact this domain

data.description: Addditional data required for some TLDs

package.description: New package id, optonal when upgrading resources

cycle.description: New billing cycle, optonal when upgrading resources

send.description: Set to true when you want to send your upgrade request

immediate.description: set to false to terminate service at the end of billing date, true - terminate immediately

domain.description: Domain name, ie. example.com, may be optional

custom.description: Additional options data available for sop products

ignore_errors.description: Process order even if some of the items were rejected due to errors

output.description: Type of output, default is short. Possible options short - Basic details about the item in cart config- Basic details and form components full - All details available in cart
